attributes.comment:
I can understand the need to raise the cost of fingerprinting and the cost of filing
for the I-600A, but ....PLEASE extend the expiration of both or at least the I600A
to 24 months!!!!.
We are leaving in a few weeks to complete the adoption of our 2nd daughter from
China. We had to refile for the I600A and had to get refingerprinted, also had to
complete all the necessary refiling for our state requirements. This cost us an
extra 2500.00 dollars that we should not have had to spend!! This is on top of the
average 20,000 to 25,000 that is already spent on adoption.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Denise M. Ellison
